00023 #include "vtkAdapter.hpp"
00024 
00025 namespace isis
00026 {
00027 namespace adapter
00028 {
00029 
00030 //return a list of vtkImageData type pointer
00031 std::vector<vtkSmartPointer<vtkImageData> >vtkAdapter::makeVtkImageObject( const boost::shared_ptr<data::Image> src, ScalingType &scaling )
00032 {
00033     const util::fvector4 indexOrigin( src->getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" ) );
00034     const util::fvector4 spacing( src->getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" ) );
00035     std::vector<vtkSmartPointer<vtkImageData> > retVector;
00036     util::ValueReference min, max;
00037     src->getMinMax( min, max );
00038     scaling = src->getChunksAsVector().front()->getScalingTo( data::ValuePtr<uint8_t>::staticID, *min, *max, data::autoscale );
00039     void *targePtr = malloc( src->getBytesPerVoxel() * src->getVolume() );
00040     uint8_t *refTarget = ( uint8_t * ) targePtr;
00041     size_t chunkIndex = 0;
00042     std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< data::Chunk> > chList = src->getChunksAsVector();
00043     const data::scaling_pair scale = src->getScalingTo( data::ValuePtr<uint8_t>::staticID );
00044     BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr< data::Chunk> & ref, chList ) {
00045         data::Chunk &chRef = *ref;
00046         uint8_t *target = refTarget + chunkIndex++ * chRef.getVolume();
00047         chRef.copyToMem<uint8_t>( target, scale );
00048     }
00049     size_t imageVolume3D = src->getSizeAsVector()[0] * src->getSizeAsVector()[1] * src->getSizeAsVector()[2];
00050 
00051     for ( size_t t = 0; t < src->getSizeAsVector()[3]; t++ ) {
00052         vtkSmartPointer<vtkImageImport> importer = vtkImageImport::New();
00053         vtkSmartPointer<vtkImageData> vtkImage = vtkImageData::New();
00054         importer->SetDataScalarTypeToUnsignedChar();
00055         vtkImage->SetScalarTypeToUnsignedChar();
00056         importer->SetImportVoidPointer( refTarget + t * imageVolume3D );
00057         importer->SetWholeExtent( 0, src->getSizeAsVector()[0] - 1, 0, src->getSizeAsVector()[1] - 1, 0, src->getSizeAsVector()[2] - 1 );
00058         importer->SetDataExtentToWholeExtent();
00059         importer->Update();
00060         vtkImage = importer->GetOutput();
00061         vtkImage->SetSpacing( spacing[0], spacing[1], spacing[2] );
00062         vtkImage->SetOrigin( indexOrigin[0], indexOrigin[1], indexOrigin[2] );
00063         vtkImage->Update();
00064         retVector.push_back( vtkImage );
00065     }
00066 
00067     return retVector;
00068 }
00069 
00070 }
00071 } //end namespace
